LoginPage.passwordHint: 8+ characters, one uppercase, one lowercase, one number, and one special character (@$!%*?&_).

LoginPage.emailInUseError: This email is already in use.

LoginPage.userProfileError: Could not create user profile. Please try again.

DashboardLayout.loadingDescription: Please wait while we load your financial data.

AiSummary.title: AI Financial Advisor
AiSummary.description: Get personalized advice to improve your financial habits.
AiSummary.placeholderDescription: Click the button below to receive personalized tips from our AI advisor.
AiSummary.error: Could not generate advice. Please try again.

TransactionDataTable.title: Recent Transactions
TransactionDataTable.description: View and manage your financial movements.
TransactionDataTable.noTransactions: No transactions found matching the filters.
TransactionDataTable.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the transaction from your records.

AddTransactionDialog.title: Add New Transaction
AddTransactionDialog.description: Complete the details to add a new financial record.
AddTransactionDialog.errorToast: Could not add transaction. Please try again.

AddCreditCardTransactionDialog.title: New Credit Card Transaction
AddCreditCardTransactionDialog.description: Record a new expense made with your credit card.
AddCreditCardTransactionDialog.errorToast: Could not record the expense. Please try again.

PayCreditCardDialog.title: Pay Credit Card
PayCreditCardDialog.description: Record a payment towards your credit card debt.
PayCreditCardDialog.errorToast: Could not record payment. Please try again.

AddTransferDialog.title: Make Transfer
AddTransferDialog.errorToast: Could not record transfer. Please try again.

EditTransactionDialog.title: Edit Transaction
EditTransactionDialog.description: Update the details of your financial record.
EditTransactionDialog.errorToast: Could not update transaction. Please try again.

SettingsDialog.title: Settings
SettingsDialog.description: Customize your application settings, accounts, and categories.
SettingsDialog.currencySectionDescription: Select the main currency for your transactions.
SettingsDialog.accountsSectionDescription: Add and manage the accounts you use (e.g., Bank, Cash).
SettingsDialog.categoriesSectionDescription: Organize your income and expenses with custom categories.
SettingsDialog.currencySuccessDescription: Your main currency has been updated.

Toasts.signupSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. You can now log in.
